extensionDesc.message: In-depth stats for your envato sales
extensionDesc.description: Description of the extension for the extensions page

dateFormat_default.description: Date format - Complet default date format

dateFormat_mediumDate.description: Date format - Medium date, with short month name

dateFormat_longDate.description: Date format - Long date, with full month name

dateFormat_fullDate.description: Date format - Full format, with day name and month name

dateFormat_shortTime.description: Date format - Short time, with only hours and minutes

dateFormat_longTime.description: Date format - Long time, with leading zero

dateFormat_sqlDatetime.description: Date format - SQL datetime query format

dateFormat_week.description: Date format - Week number and year

daysLetter_Sunday.description: First letter of day name - Sunday

daysLetter_Monday.description: First letter of day name - Monday

daysLetter_Tuesday.description: First letter of day name - Tuesday

daysLetter_Wednesday.description: First letter of day name - Wednesday

daysLetter_Thursday.description: First letter of day name - Thursday

daysLetter_Friday.description: First letter of day name - Friday

daysLetter_Saturday.description: First letter of day name - Saturday

ready.description: Message when an widget is ready

ok.description: Text on submit button to save form

save.description: Text of save button when choosing a currency

loadingDatabase.description: Message on the init screen, when loading database for the first time

errorInitDatabase.description: Error while loading database for the first time

loadingStatementArchiveStatus.description: Progress status when loading the statement archives

refreshingCurrencyRates.description: Message when loading the current currency rates

errorWhileLoadingType.description: Error displayed when loading a ressource of type $type$ failed

type.example: Type of element whose loading has failed

currencyConversion.description: Message displayed when applying the new currency rate to the database

loadingStatus.description: Progress status when loading multiple elements

changeCurrency.description: Text of button to start setting another currency

instructionOERAccount.message: To use currency conversion, please create a $linkStart$free account$linkEnd$ on Open Exchange Rate and paste your App ID below:
instructionOERAccount.description: Instructions for creating and entering the OER App ID

linkStart.example: Opening tag of the wrapping anchor

linkEnd.example: Closing tag of the wrapping anchor

pleaseEnterOERAPIKey.message: Please enter your OpenExchangeRate API Key
pleaseEnterOERAPIKey.description: Error message if the user submitted an empty value for the OER App ID

resetSettings.description: Text of button to reset settings

rebuildDatabase.description: Text of button to rebuild database

settingsHaveBeenReset.description: Confirmation message when settings have been reset

refresh.description: Text of button to refresh sales data

autoRefresh.description: Label of checkbox to enable auto-refresh

disabled.description: Text of tooltip on auto-refresh when auto-refresh is disabled

30days.description: Text of button to use a 30 days time range for charts

6months.description: Text of button to use a 6 months time range for charts

allTime.description: Text of button to use full time range for charts

numberSalesSingular.description: Display a number of sales when there is 0 or 1 sale

numberSalesPlural.description: Display a number of sales when there is more than one sale

noActivity.description: Message when no sales are found for a time point in a chart

salesDistributionByItem.description: Legend of the chart showing sales and earnings distribution by item

otherItems.description: Legend for the part of the chart showing sales and earnings distribution by item corresponding to all non listed items

salesDistributionByDayOfWeek.message: Sales distribution by day of week
salesDistributionByDayOfWeek.description: Legend of the chart showing sales distribution by day of week

salesDistributionByHourOfDay.message: Sales distribution by hour of day
salesDistributionByHourOfDay.description: Legend for the chart showing sales distribution by hour of day

thisWeek.description: Title for widgets showing a stat for the current week

thisMonth.description: Title for widgets showing a stat for the current month

totalSales.description: Title for widgets showing the total number of sales

estimationShort.description: Shortened version of Estimation, prefixed to the actual estimation in some widgets (must be short!)

totalAmountSold.description: Title for widgets showing the total amount sold

totalEarnings.description: Title for widgets showing the total earnings

numberReferralCutsSingular.description: Display the number of referral cuts when there is 0 or 1

numberReferralCutsPlural.description: Display the number of referral cuts when there is more than one

amountToNext.description: Display an amount to the next level for paws/rates/elite levels

maxReached.description: Message displayed when the max paws/rates/elite level has been reached
